content.p: Print RCWs > Title 82 > Chapter 82.12 > Section 82.12.060 82.12.045 << 82.12.060 >> 82.12.070 PDF RCW 82.12.060 Installment sales or leases. In the case of installment sales and leases of personal property, the department, by rule, may provide for the collection of taxes upon the installments of the purchase price, or amount of rental, as of the time the same fall due.
